message:
以下摘自♂王♂的Facebook：
Billy Herrington
To All my Chinese fans! I have just booked an huge event in Chendu China for Oct 2nd.
I wanted to prove my love for Chinese fans so accept this gesture. I'm traveling Oceans to show love! See you soon! Details to be provided soon

約於 1 小時前在 Lindenhurst, NY, United States 附近 ·

大概就是10.2的时候有大型show啦..
